item.description:
Welcome to CT Theatre Group!

Join us as we explore the best of arts, Theatre, and Cultural Events in Connecticut!

Arts and Theatre info and interviews are available on the Spotlight on Connecticut show - LIVE 24/7 and fresh each week on http://www.SpotlightonCT.com and http://www.CTWeekend.com -CT Calendar of Events at http://www.CTWeekend.com

Join Arts And Theatre Lovers Across Connecticut As We Enjoy The Best Of The Performance Arts

Theatre Lovers Unite!

Love the Theatre, but don't get there often enough?

Don't have anyone you can count on to join you?

Don't have the time to search out the good shows?

You will get emails about the shows we will be attending. Buy your ticket online, and join our group for a fun night of Theatre, with time to chat and socialize afterwards.

We do all the work for you, just buy your ticket and join us!

Visit http://www.CTTheatreGroup.org
item.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount
